# OCI GenAI Provider for Vercel AI SDK

> Universal Vercel AI SDK provider for Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Generative AI

## What This Is

A Vercel AI SDK provider that enables OCI GenAI models (xAI Grok, Meta Llama, Cohere, Google Gemini) in any application using the Vercel AI SDK.

Works with: Next.js, Remix, SvelteKit, Node.js, OpenCode, and any Vercel AI SDK app.

## Package Structure

- @acedergren/oci-genai-provider - Core provider (works everywhere)
- @acedergren/opencode-oci-genai - Optional OpenCode convenience wrapper
- @acedergren/test-utils - Shared test utilities (private)

## Status

✅ 117 tests passing
✅ 80%+ code coverage
✅ Production ready
✅ Full TypeScript support

## Key Features

- 16+ models (Grok, Llama, Cohere, Gemini)
- Streaming support (SSE)
- Tool calling
- Multiple auth methods
- EU data residency
- Type-safe

## Quick Example

```typescript
import { oci } from '@acedergren/oci-genai-provider';
import { generateText } from 'ai';

const result = await generateText({
  model: oci('cohere.command-r-plus'),
  prompt: 'Hello!',
});
```

## Documentation

See /docs/ for complete documentation.
See /packages/oci-genai-provider/README.md for core provider docs.
See /packages/opencode-integration/README.md for OpenCode integration.

## Architecture

Core provider → OCI SDK → OCI GenAI Service
OpenCode integration → Core provider (optional thin wrapper)

The core provider is independent and universal.
The OpenCode package just adds convenience helpers.

## Monorepo Info

- **Architecture**: pnpm workspace monorepo (3 packages)
- **Region**: eu-frankfurt-1 (primary)
- **Version**: 0.1.0 (in development)
- **License**: MIT

## Workspace Commands

```bash
pnpm install              # Install all dependencies
pnpm build                # Build all packages
pnpm test                 # Run all tests
pnpm test:coverage        # Run tests with coverage
```

## Quick Reference Links

- Getting Started: /docs/getting-started/README.md
- Core Provider: /packages/oci-genai-provider/README.md
- OpenCode Integration: /docs/guides/opencode-integration/README.md
- Authentication: /docs/guides/authentication/README.md
- Model Catalog: /docs/reference/oci-genai-models/README.md
- Architecture: /docs/architecture/README.md

## Model Families

- xAI Grok (4-maverick, 4-scout, 3, 3-mini)
- Meta Llama (3.3-70b, 3.2-vision, 3.1-405b)
- Cohere Command (R+, A, A-reasoning, A-vision)
- Google Gemini (2.5-pro, 2.5-flash, 2.5-flash-lite)

## Authentication Methods

- API Key (config file)
- Instance Principal (OCI Compute)
- Resource Principal (OCI Functions)
